alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 3:00PM MDT until May 29 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 259 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Caputa, or 16 miles east of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Farmingdale around 305 PM MDT. New Underwood around 310 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Owanka and Wasta. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 67 and 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
